body.default: perfect hourglass figure: slim waist with full bust and hips in ideal proportion, smooth curves flowing naturally, long elegant neck(完美沙漏身材：纤细腰身配合丰满上围和臀部的理想比例，曲线自然流畅，优雅修长颈部)
choices: none(无)
perfect hourglass figure: slim waist with full bust and hips in ideal proportion, smooth curves flowing naturally, long elegant neck(完美沙漏身材：纤细腰身配合丰满上围和臀部的理想比例，曲线自然流畅，优雅修长颈部)
curvy hourglass: voluptuous figure with prominent bust, tiny waist and full hips, soft feminine curves throughout body(丰满沙漏：丰满上围，纤细腰身和丰满臀部，全身柔美曲线)
athletic hourglass: toned figure with defined waist, athletic bust and sculpted hips, lean muscle definition(运动沙漏：紧致身材，收腰，运动感上围和雕塑感臀部，匀称肌肉线条)
slim model figure: tall and slender build with long limbs, elegant proportions, subtle natural curves(纤细模特身材：高挑苗条，四肢修长，优雅比例，自然柔和曲线)
petite slim: delicate small frame with fine bone structure, small bust and slim hips, graceful proportions(娇小纤细：精致小巧骨架，娇小上围和纤细臀部，优雅比例)
willowy figure: tall and reed-slim with long legs, straight elegant lines, subtle curves(柳条身材：高挑纤细，长腿，优雅直线条，细微曲线)
fit athletic: well-toned body with defined muscles, medium bust and firm curves, strong yet feminine silhouette(健身运动型：良好肌肉线条，中等上围和紧致曲线，强韧中带女性美)
lean athletic: slender muscular build with small firm bust, defined abs, long toned legs(精瘦运动型：纤细肌肉型，小巧紧致上围，腹肌线条，修长紧致双腿)
sporty balanced: athletic build with proportional bust, toned waist and strong legs, harmonious muscle definition(均衡运动型：运动体格，匀称上围，紧致腰身和强健双腿，和谐肌肉线条)
balanced natural: medium build with harmonious proportions, natural bust size, smooth flowing lines(自然均衡型：中等体格，和谐比例，自然上围，流畅线条)
proportional curvy: evenly distributed curves with medium-full bust, defined waist, rounded hips(均衡曲线型：均匀分布曲线，中等丰满上围，明显腰身，圆润臀部)
classic balanced: well-proportioned figure with moderate curves, medium bust and hips in harmony(经典均衡型：良好比例，适中曲线，中等上围和臀部和谐)
long-legged: exceptionally long legs with slim ankles, proportional upper body, elegant height(长腿型：特长双腿，纤细脚踝，匀称上半身，优雅身高)
small-waisted: dramatically small waist with proportional bust and hips, defined waistline(细腰型：显著纤细腰身，匀称上围和臀部，明显腰线)
full-busted: generous bust with slim waist and proportional hips, feminine silhouette(丰满上围：丰满胸部，纤细腰身和匀称臀部，女性化轮廓)
toned-slim: lean figure with subtle muscle definition, small firm bust, long limbs(紧致纤细：精瘦身材，细微肌肉线条，小巧紧实上围，修长四肢)

standing.contrapposto: standing with weight on one leg, hip slightly tilted, shoulders balanced, arms relaxed(站姿.对比姿势：重心在一条腿上，臀部微倾，肩膀平衡，手臂放松)
standing.fashion: standing straight, one foot slightly forward, hand on hip, chin slightly down(站姿.时尚：笔直站立，一只脚略前，手放臀部，下巴略低)
standing.s_curve: standing with curved body line, one hip out, shoulders back, head gracefully tilted(站姿.S曲线：站姿体现曲线，一侧臀部突出，肩膀后收，头部优雅倾斜)
sitting.cross_legged: sitting relaxed on chair, legs elegantly crossed, hands naturally placed in lap(坐姿.翘腿：放松坐在椅子上，优雅交叉双腿，手自然放在大腿上)
sitting.edge_perch: sitting on furniture edge, one leg crossed over knee, upper body turned slightly(坐姿.边缘：坐在家具边缘，一条腿搭在膝盖上，上身稍微转动)
sitting.ground: sitting on floor with legs tucked to side, one hand supporting weight(坐姿.地面：坐在地上，腿侧收，一只手撑地)
movement.walking: mid-stride with natural arm swing, shoulders back, head high(动态.行走：迈步瞬间，手臂自然摆动，肩膀后收，抬头挺胸)
movement.turning: body in mid-turn, dress/hair in motion, arms flowing with movement(动态.转身：转身瞬间，裙摆/头发飘动，手臂随动作流动)
movement.leaping: caught in mid-jump, arms extended, body showing graceful line(动态.跳跃：跳跃瞬间，手臂展开，身体展现优美线条)
leaning.wall: relaxed lean against wall, one foot crossed over other, shoulders touching wall(倚靠.墙：放松靠墙，一只脚交叉，肩膀贴墙)
leaning.rail: leaning on railing, body angled, looking into distance(倚靠.栏杆：靠在栏杆上，身体成角度，眺望远方)
leaning.casual: relaxed lean on furniture, weight on one leg, natural arm position(倚靠.随意：随意靠在家具上，重心在一条腿上，手臂自然放置)
editorial.high_fashion: exaggerated contrapposto, angular arms, strong jaw line(杂志.高级时尚：夸张的对比姿势，棱角分明的手臂，强烈的下颌线)
editorial.crouch: stylized squat, elbows on knees, face in profile(杂志.蹲姿：风格化蹲姿，手肘放在膝盖上，侧脸示人)
editorial.avant_garde: asymmetrical pose with artistic body angles and limb placement(杂志.前卫：不对称的姿势，艺术性的身体角度和肢体摆放)
portrait.beauty: shoulders at angle, chin slightly down, eyes to camera(肖像.美人：肩膀成角度，下巴略低，目视镜头)
portrait.profile: clean side view, neck elongated, shoulders back(肖像.侧面：清晰的侧面视角，颈部伸长，肩膀后收)
portrait.over_shoulder: body turned away, head looking back over shoulder(肖像.回眸：身体背对，头部转回看向肩膀)
candid.laugh: genuine smile, slightly bent forward, hands near face(自然.笑容：真诚的笑容，略微前倾，手靠近脸部)
candid.motion: natural walking pause, mid-gesture, candid expression(自然.动作：自然行走停顿，手势半途，自然表情)
candid.moment: relaxed stance, genuine smile, natural hand placement(自然.时刻：放松姿态，真实笑容，自然手势)

thoughtful look with parted lips(若有所思的表情，双唇微启)

commercial_spaces.mall_boutique: luxury brand flagship store facade with elegant window displays, mall atrium skylight casting soft diffused light from above on subject's face and outfit while illuminating store displays with bright even lighting, creating gentle shadows under cheekbones and subtle highlights on hair, environment filled with balanced ambient light that reveals architectural details(商业空间.精品商场：优雅橱窗陈列的旗舰店外立面，商场中庭天窗从上方投射柔和漫射光打在人物脸部和服装上，同时明亮均匀地照亮商店展示，在颧骨下方形成温和阴影，头发上产生细腻光泽，环境充满平衡的环境光展现建筑细节)

commercial_spaces.cafe: cute themed cafe with pastel decor and neon signs, warm string lights creating a soft glow around subject's silhouette while casting gentle shadows across face, neon accents adding colorful highlights to hair and skin, ambient cafe lighting providing warm fill light that softens features and illuminates decor details(商业空间.咖啡店：粉彩装饰与霓虹灯的主题咖啡店，温暖串灯在人物轮廓周围创造柔和光晕并在脸部投射温和阴影，霓虹灯为头发和肌肤添加彩色高光，咖啡店环境光提供温暖补光柔化特征并照亮装饰细节)

natural_scenes.sunset: seaside boardwalk with palm trees and ocean view, golden hour sunlight casting long dramatic shadows while creating warm rim light around subject's silhouette, soft reflected light from ocean providing gentle fill light on face, environment bathed in rich amber tones with palm shadows creating dynamic patterns(自然场景.日落：棕榈树和海景木栈道，黄金时刻阳光投射戏剧性长阴影同时在人物轮廓周围创造温暖轮廓光，海面反射的柔光为脸部提供温和补光，环境沐浴在丰富的琥珀色调中，棕榈树影创造动态图案)

professional_settings.studio: photo studio with white cyclorama background, main light sculpting facial features with soft shadows, fill light gently illuminating shadow areas, rim light defining body silhouette against background, reflectors providing subtle highlights in eyes and hair(专业场景.摄影棚：白色无限背景，主光塑造面部特征形成柔和阴影，补光温和照亮阴影区域，轮廓光勾勒人物身体轮廓，反光板在眼睛和头发上创造细腻高光)

night_scenes.urban_night: bustling shopping district with fashion boutiques and neon signs, colorful neon lights casting vibrant highlights across face and outfit, street lamps providing warm top light, shop windows adding soft fill light from multiple angles, creating a dynamic interplay of colored shadows and highlights(夜景.城市夜景：时尚精品店和霓虹招牌的繁华商业区，彩色霓虹灯在脸部和服装上投射鲜艳高光，路灯提供温暖顶光，橱窗提供多角度柔和补光，营造色彩阴影和高光的动态交互)

indoor_natural_light.window_scene: art gallery space with minimalist white walls and track lighting, soft natural window light creating gentle shadows across face while providing main illumination, warm indoor lights adding fill light to shadow areas, track lights highlighting specific features and creating depth through selective lighting(室内自然光.窗景：极简白墙和轨道灯的艺术画廊，柔和自然窗光在脸部创造温和阴影并提供主要照明，温暖室内灯光为阴影区域补光，轨道灯突出特定特征并通过选择性照明创造深度)

natural_scenes.dawn: misty meadow at sunrise with dewdrops on grass, early morning sunlight casting long soft shadows while creating golden rim light on subject's silhouette, cool ambient light mixing with warm directional rays, morning mist diffusing light and adding atmospheric depth(自然场景.黎明：晨露草地的清晨，朝阳投射柔和长影同时在人物轮廓形成金色轮廓光，清凉环境光与温暖定向光交融，晨雾漫射光线增添氛围深度)

natural_scenes.golden_sunset: rolling hills bathed in golden light, intense warm sunlight creating dramatic rim lighting and long shadows, sky colors reflecting off skin with warm orange tones, backlit dust particles adding atmospheric glow(自然场景.金色日落：沐浴在金光中的起伏丘陵，强烈温暖阳光创造戏剧性轮廓光和长阴影，天空色彩在皮肤上反射温暖橙色调，逆光尘埃增添大气光晕)

natural_scenes.summer_noon: sun-drenched garden with vibrant flowers, harsh overhead sunlight creating strong shadows and bright highlights, heat shimmer adding atmospheric distortion, reflected light from surrounding foliage providing natural fill(自然场景.夏日正午：阳光普照的花园，强烈顶光形成深邃阴影和明亮高光，热浪扭曲增添氛围，周围植物反射光提供自然补光)

natural_scenes.cloudy_afternoon: overcast sky over wildflower field, soft diffused lighting eliminating harsh shadows, even illumination across subject, muted colors with enhanced texture detail(自然场景.阴天午后：野花田野上的阴云，柔和漫射光消除硬阴影，主体均匀照明，柔和色彩突显纹理细节)

urban_decay.abandoned_corner: weathered concrete walls with peeling paint, filtered sunlight through broken windows creating dramatic light beams, ambient bounce light softening shadows, dust particles catching light rays(城市废墟.废弃角落：斑驳混凝土墙面，破碎窗户透过的阳光形成戏剧性光束，环境反射光软化阴影，灰尘颗粒捕捉光线)

urban_decay.overgrown_ruins: crumbling architecture overtaken by vegetation, dappled sunlight filtering through leaves creating dynamic patterns, soft green bounce light from foliage, natural rim lighting through gaps(城市废墟.杂草遗迹：被植被占据的破败建筑，树叶过滤的斑驳阳光创造动态图案，植物柔和绿色反光，缝隙透过的自然轮廓光)

wild_nature.dense_forest: thick forest canopy with filtered light, soft green ambient light from leaves, dramatic light beams piercing through trees, dappled shadows creating dynamic patterns(野性自然.茂密森林：浓密树冠过滤光线，叶片柔和绿色环境光，穿透树林的戏剧性光束，斑驳阴影创造动态图案)

wild_nature.mountain_vista: rugged mountain landscape at dawn, early sunlight creating dramatic shadows across valleys, cool ambient light from sky, warm directional light highlighting terrain(野性自然.山景：黎明时分的崎岖山景，晨光在山谷间投射戏剧性阴影，天空清凉环境光，温暖定向光突显地形)

urban_night.rain_street: wet city street reflecting neon lights, raindrops catching and splitting light creating sparkles, diffused glow through mist, multiple colored light sources creating complex shadows(城市夜景.雨街：反射霓虹的湿润街道，雨滴捕捉折射光线形成闪烁，薄雾中的漫射光晕，多彩光源创造复杂阴影)

urban_night.subway_entrance: underground station entrance with mixed lighting, fluorescent overhead lights creating stark shadows, distant street lights adding warm accents, reflected light from wet surfaces(城市夜景.地铁入口：混合照明的地下站台入口，荧光顶灯创造鲜明阴影，远处街灯增添温暖重点，潮湿表面反射光)
